title: The News Parade: Yanks invade Marshall Islands
brief_description: Cinemagazine containing newsreel footage of American troopships sailing towards the Marshall Islands in 1944. Includes aerial shots of the US bombing of Japanese defenses; a navy attack; the gathering of empty shell cases; and scenes of the dead and wounded on both the American and Japanese sides.
